title: Merry Christmas
author: VD
content_html:
It was harder than usual this year to shop for a certain individual, (not that it’s ever easy), to say nothing of the eclectic agglomerate of genuises, misfits, babes, freaks, soldiers, sociopaths, award-winning authors, government agents, evangelicals and agnostics who haunt this blog.

So, I got everyone a book. It’s in my preferred Palm doc format (.pdb), which requires the free eReader that can be downloaded for Windows, Macintosh, and various mobile operating systems here. If you prefer PDF format for some strange reason, you can find a version to suit you over on the right.

Merry Christmas!
content_text:
It was harder than usual this year to shop for a certain individual, (not that it’s ever easy), to say nothing of the eclectic agglomerate of genuises, misfits, babes, freaks, soldiers, sociopaths, award-winning authors, government agents, evangelicals and agnostics who haunt this blog.
So,
I got everyone a book
.  It’s in my preferred Palm doc format (.pdb), which requires the free eReader that can be downloaded for Windows, Macintosh, and various mobile operating systems
here
.  If you prefer PDF format for some strange reason, you can find a version to suit you over on the right.
Merry Christmas!
